the realignment atop the company's Server and Tools division. Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president over the company's Azure cloud unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, said Simon Cowell in a statement.`` I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent, and we are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5 million recording contract.

Monday afternoon Senate Democrats sent out a message noting that Ryan's Roadmap has now been endorsed by the House Majority Leader and the top Republicans on both the House and Senate budget committees. Democrats are aware that any proposal to adjust entitlement programs is a politically charged issue for members of both parties-and a shrewd political move is to link entitlement cuts to members of the opposing party.

The Insurance Institute for Highway Safety and others have questioned whetherbanning texting behind the wheel orusing a hand-held cell phone reduces traffic accidents. Ray LaHood responded Thursday by saying, there are some who would like to derail our work spotlighting the dangers of texting or talking on the phone while driving. I want them to know that our fight to end distracted driving will not be deterred. Ray LaHood has been on a self-described`` rampage'' on the issue in the wake of harrowing stories of motorists killed by drivers who were texting or talking on a phone.
